isLessThan3HoursAgo(uint256).details: Check if the timestamp is more recent than (current time - 3 hours)

voteForProposal(uint256,uint256,uint256,.details: Register a vote in the contract.

params.nullifier: : Nullifier for the user's Aadhaar data.
params.nullifierSeed: : Nullifier Seed used while generating the proof.
params.proposalIndex: : Index of the proposal you want to vote for.
params.revealArray: : Array of the values used as input for the proof generation (equal to [0, 0, 0, 0] if no field reveal were asked).
params.timestamp: : Timestamp of when the QR code was signed.
